attributes.action: Ban all young people from voting
attributes.background: After the EU referendum, young people have cried out unanimously that old people's democratic rights should be repealed based solely on disagreement. Before they can take the human rights of others away, we must preemptively send a message and demonstrate how horrible a loss of a vote can truly be.

rejection.details: "Young people" is an insufficiently precise term for the purposes of setting a lower age limit for the franchise.
